items.title: 'Iâ€™m going to have hungry kids': Some Americans prepare for halt in SNAP benefits
items.description: Some Americans who receive SNAP benefits said they might not be available to feed their families or pay for household expenses if benefits are paused.

items.title: Hurricane Melissa path: Where and when Melissa will make landfall
items.description: Hurricane Melissa, now a powerful Category 5 storm, will slam into Jamaica on Monday as the worst storm the island has ever seen.

items.title: WATCH:  French police arrest 2 Louvre jewel heist suspects amid manhunt
items.description: Two men from a Paris suburb have been arrested in connection with last week's major jewel heist at the Louvre Museum, French National Police confirmed...

items.title: American climber speaks out after history-making ski down Mount Everest
items.description: Climber Jim Morrison and filmmaker Jimmy Chin discussed Morrison's history-making descent of Everest's north side on skis.

items.title: WATCH:  Huge hail churns pool in Australia
items.description: Hail stones pounded a backyard pool and smashed car windscreens in Brisbane, Australia, on Sunday.
